svg.title: Testcase for changing the 'transform' on foreignObject
svg.script: // The foreignObject is inverted so that it is outside the viewport. // After the rect has rendered the transform on the // foreignObject is removed and the green div should fill the viewport. document.addEventListener("MozReftestInvalidate", doTest, false); setTimeout(doTest, 4000); // fallback for running outside reftest function doTest() { document.getElementById('fo').setAttribute('transform', ''); document.documentElement.removeAttribute('class'); }
